Joel Sabillón

31 books in one year

August 11, 2016

So it's been a while since I've bought a physical book. But last year, sometime in June I got a used Kindle. I was checking out my amazon digital orders and I realized I read 31 books between June 2015 to June 2016. And that includes Game of Thrones which took me an entire month to read!
